attributes.action: Free from Products not a choice
attributes.additional_details:
It is a known fact that food costs are rising! And most can complain about it and do nothing about it! Well I would like to make a stand about Free From Food products need to be controlled and brought into alignment with the regular foods.

I am Lactose and Wheat intolerant, and my loaf of bread costs avg £3.00, regular loaf costs £0.75 that is a 400% increase! This is normal and is NOT fair

Being a vegetarian is a choice which is highly catered for, however intolerances are a way of life and have the choice taken away.

We need Free From Products to be limited on the cost and not to be taken advantage of.
